attributes.description:
The XC60 is a hugely important model for Volvo. Not only is it the best-selling model in the Swedish brandâ€™s lineup, but it is also the best-selling car in its segment in Europe.
The Volvo XC60 is a distinctive shape that brings some sportwagon style to the crossover category.
The XC60 handles decently. Like the best of crossovers, it handles like a car--which is to say, like a much lower vehicle--and conveys a secure feeling in the corners that inspires driver confidence. With 9.1 inches of ground clearance and a solid Haldex all-wheel drive system, the XC60 has the goods for getting through muddy fields, and even rutted trails and rocky roads.
The Volvo XC60 remains one of the best-rated cars on the market for safety. It earned a top five stars overall from the National Highway Traffic Safety Administration.
The XC60 is an all-wheel drive 4 door with 5 seats, powered by a 2.4L DIESEL TURBO 5 engine that has 158 kW of power (at 4000 rpm) and 440 Nm of torque (at 1500 rpm) via a 6 SP AUTOMATIC GEARTRONIC.
The Volvo XC60 crossover stays stylish.
This specific Volvo is a 1 Owner (Dr.) vehicle with full service history at the Agents and is in an immaculate condition

Finance available and
Trade ins welcome.
